name: my game (Afely)
description:
IMPORTANT: I highly recommend you play the windows version if you can. The HTML5 version works, but it is a much worse experience.

Hello, player. This is my gam̵̘͚͋̈ͅě̷͔͇̯͛͛.̵̧͉̃̋́ ̴̡͎̅I̴͈͗ made it over the course of 3 da̷̼̙̮̍͑̀̊͋̾̄́͛̇̀̓͘̚͠͠ys, for the WOWIEEEEE!!!!!! game jam 3.0. Game developers are not usually supposed to speak directly to the player, but this i̵s̵ ̴m̵y bes̸͇͙͚͖͚̩̗͂̈́̊̀t̸̹̻́ game yet, so I think I should talk with you a little bit.

Don't yo̴u̶ ̵a̶g̸ree̴?

Player model made by johnny23: https://www.cgtrader.com/free-3d-print-models/miniatures/figurines/anatomy-man-p...
